'--transition-fast':designTokens.transitions.fast,'--transition-normal':designTokens.transitions.normal});// =============================================================================
// Helper Functions
// =============================================================================
/**
 * Get risk color based on severity level
 */export const getRiskColor=level=>{return designTokens.colors.risk[level];};/**
 * Get glow shadow for a specific color
 */export const getGlowShadow=function(color){let intensity=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'medium';const intensities={subtle:"0 0 10px ".concat(alpha(color,0.3)),medium:"0 0 20px ".concat(alpha(color,0.5),", 0 0 40px ").concat(alpha(color,0.3)),strong:"0 0 30px ".concat(color,", 0 0 60px ").concat(alpha(color,0.5),", 0 0 90px ").concat(alpha(color,0.3))};return intensities[intensity];};export default theme;
